segments.text: Are there any hobbies you do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When I have time , I sometimes draw and paint .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you always know how to draw and paint ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was taught in high school how to draw and paint .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Exactly , it was my favorite class .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it's good that you're so talented .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Talent is a great thing , I wish I had one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Everyone has a talent . They just need to find it .
segments.speaker: S2
